Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for GoodLife AC-series Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip; models for single patient self-testing at home, and professional models for multiple patient testing in clinical settings; not for diagnosis or neonatal use.
